bibdata.title: IEEE Guide on the Measurement for the Performance of Aeolian Vibration Dampers for Single Conductors
IEEE Guide on the Measurement for the Performance of Aeolian Vibration Dampers for Single Conductors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Superseded by 664-1993. The current methodologies, including apparatus, procedures, and measurement accuracies, for determining the dynamic characteristics of vibration dampers and damping systems are described. Some basic guidance is provided regarding a given methodâ€™s strengths and weaknesses. The methodologies and procedures described are applicable to indoor testing only.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
